name: Weretiger
movement: 30 ft. walking, 40 ft. in tiger form
description: A humanoid cursed with the ability to transform into a tiger or hybrid form; known for sharp claws and fangs.
memorable: Immunity to nonmagical and non-silvered weapon damage, fierce territorial protectors.
goals: Typically solitary hunters, fiercely protective of their territory.
relations: May serve or be found with other lycanthropes; typically avoid civilized areas.
environment: Remote jungles and forests where they can hunt in peace.
strengths: High physical abilities, stealth skills, and form versatility grant tactical advantages in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to wolfsbane, which can poison and damage them.
attacks: Multiattack capabilities using claws and bite; can knock targets prone.
most_powerful_ability: Bite attack can curse humanoids with weretiger lycanthropy.
equipment: Can wield weapons like scimitars and longbows in humanoid form.
senses: Keen hearing and smell grant advantage on Perception checks related to these senses.
skills: Proficient in stealth and perception, capable of effective ambush tactics.
additional_information: Can shapeshift between humanoid, hybrid, and tiger forms.
Pounce ability allows knocking opponents prone for extra attacks.
Frenzied Bite makes it more dangerous when bloodied.
Bleed Prey ability tracks and inflicts ongoing damage to marked prey.
Immunity to most non-silvered weapon damages enhances survivability.
test_queries: humanoid that can become a tiger
stealthy shapechanger that is a werebeast
